results.title: Metformin reduces bone resorption in apical periodontitis through regulation of osteoblast and osteoclast differentiation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ in @DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@ through regulation of osteoblast and osteoclast differentiation.

citations.NLM: Hong CY, Lin SK, Wang HW, Shun CT, Yang CN, Hsiang-Hua Lai E, Cheng SJ, Chen MH, Yang H, Lin HY, Wu FY, Kok SH. Metformin reduces bone resorption in apical periodontitis through regulation of osteoblast and osteoclast differentiation. J Endod. 2023 Jul 14;():. PMID: 37454872

results.title: Metformin ameliorates HMGB1-mediated oxidative stress through mTOR pathway in experimental periodontitis
results.text_hl: The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly improved the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ state and slowed down @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@.

citations.NLM: Sun B, Ying S, Ma Q, Li H, Li J, Song J. Metformin ameliorates HMGB1-mediated oxidative stress through mTOR pathway in experimental periodontitis Genes Dis. 2023 Mar;10(2):542-553. PMID: 37223504

results.title: Metformin and Bone Metabolism in Endogenous Glucocorticoid Excess: An Exploratory Study
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Cushing_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D003480 @@@CS@@@-MET @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ showed decreased beta-CTX levels at baseline (p = 0.041), suggesting reduced @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ under @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment during glucocorticoid excess.

citations.NLM: Vogel F, Braun L, Rubinstein G, Zopp S, Oßwald A, Schilbach K, Schmidmaier R, Bidlingmaier M, Reincke M. Metformin and Bone Metabolism in Endogenous Glucocorticoid Excess: An Exploratory Study Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2021;12():765067. PMID: 34777259

results.title: Intracanal Metformin Promotes Healing of Apical Periodontitis via Suppressing Inducible Nitric Oxide Synthase Expression and Monocyte Recruitment.
results.text_hl: Intracanal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@ and suppressed @GENE_NOS2 @GENE_4843 @@@iNOS@@@ expression and monocyte recruitment.

citations.NLM: Wang HW, Lai EH, Yang CN, Lin SK, Hong CY, Yang H, Chang JZ, Kok SH. Intracanal Metformin Promotes Healing of Apical Periodontitis via Suppressing Inducible Nitric Oxide Synthase Expression and Monocyte Recruitment. J Endod. 2020 Jan;46(1):65-73. PMID: 31753516

results.title: V-ATPase and Lysosomal Energy Sensing in Periodontitis and Medicine-Related Osteonecrosis of the Jaw.
results.text_hl: Accumulating data suggest that it may be possible to target @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@inflammatory bone resorption@@@ through agents that stimulate L-AMPK, including @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_GCG @GENE_2641 @@@glucagon-like peptide-1@@@ agonists.

citations.NLM: Yang X, Holliday LS. V-ATPase and Lysosomal Energy Sensing in Periodontitis and Medicine-Related Osteonecrosis of the Jaw. Biomolecules. 2025 Jul 11;15(7):. PMID: 40723869
citations.BibTeX: @article{40723869, title={V-ATPase and Lysosomal Energy Sensing in Periodontitis and Medicine-Related Osteonecrosis of the Jaw.}, author={Yang X and Holliday LS}, journal={Biomolecules}, volume={15}, number={7}}

results.title: AMP kinase acts as a negative regulator of RANKL in the differentiation of osteoclasts.
results.text_hl: The AMPK activators @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_epigallocatechin_gallate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C045651 @@@(-)-epigallocatechin-3-gallate@@@, @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@berberine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Thioctic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008063 @@@alpha-lipoic acid@@@ dose-dependently suppressed formation of @GENE_SSR4 @GENE_20832 @@@TRAP@@@-positive multinucleated cells and @<m>DISEASE_Bone_Resorption</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001862 @@@bone resorption@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee YS, Kim YS, Lee SY, Kim GH, Kim BJ, Lee SH, Lee KU, Kim GS, Kim SW, Koh JM. AMP kinase acts as a negative regulator of RANKL in the differentiation of osteoclasts. Bone. 2010 Nov;47(5):926-37. PMID: 20696287
